DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to study the effect on intraocular pressure in glaucoma patients using the TravAlert dosing aid with or without the Eyot drop guider and with or without additional patient education.
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis glaucoma or ocular hypertension Treatment with travoprost or travoprost/timolol High risk of side effects expected from travoprost or travoprost/timolol Absolute inability to administer eye drops Difficulty in reading or speaking Dutch
